clean_data: Migration Specialist Migration Specialist Consultant New York NY To obtain a position in a team player work environment Providing me the opportunity to apply my dynamic resourceful and skilled IT abilities Seeking an environment where my professionalism can be used in a manner satisfying your establishments requirements benefiting and supporting fellow employees and the customer through job performance reliability and the utmost in courtesy Contributing to the establishment with a maximized bottom line and career fulfillment for myself Authorized to work in the US for any employer Work Experience Migration Specialist Div digital New York NY May 2018 to Present Architect migration paths from various sources into Drupal or WordPress CMS Write customized scraping scripts to analyze and migrate data assets Consultant Mission Accomplish Inc New York NY 2017 to 2018 New York Managed the implementation of a large data set for a client in the financial sector that needed help profile exchange information at scale Spark kubernates hadoop python and various other tools where used together to accomplish this complex but exciting project The team consisted of 3 developers Spark was recommended because of the way it can enhancing big data at scale Python Senior Architect Weboperative Inc New York NY 2017 to 2017 New York Designed and Developed a complex bot that monitors crypto currency exchanges for price and RSI changes using python 3 Implementation of asynchronous IO programming throughout the entire project to handle scaling up to 1 Million request per second if needed since the bot also scraped hundreds of websites using scrappy This project was a team of 3 developers and over 120k lines of code IT currently monitors all major exchanges social media sites for sentiment analysis alerts Tools used asyncio aiohttp pandas scikit learn scrappy beautifulsoup postgresql twython etc Senior Linux Infrastructure Architect Tierra Resource Partners LLC New York NY 2016 to 2017 New York Designed and build custom cloud infrastructure with full disk encryption and data redundancy powered by the ZFSOnLinux file system Implementation of Zabbix IDS to monitor file systems structure Handle all new IT infrastructure design and monitoring of network traffic Created a custom website using bootstrap running on Nginx MariaDB PHPFPM with daily incremental backups using zfssnapshot Setup OwnCloud integration with full encryption support for media files powered by a hardened nginx setup The whole Tierra RP network run in a LXCD environment with a hardened kernel using grsecuritynet Systems Infrastructure Architect Autoremind Inc New York NY 2016 to 2016 New York Orchestrated the design and build of ansible roles for various LAMP stack software packages and used ansibles template engine to managed the various configuration files for each service The systems build included using cobbler to automate the installation of CentOS with a customized kickstart configuration file this allowed the deployment of various barebone servers to be active within minutes not hours Systems integrator Cablevision Systems Inc New York NY 2014 to 2016 Handled traffic analyst to determine which services required migration to a new infrastructure This included analyzing various traffic data in their Apache daemon Provided detailed analysis of production performance and implemented a LAMP stack upgrade along with benchmarks to determine best possible configuration for the stack Upgraded MySQL and fixed Apache performance by integrating MPM Worker versus PreFork and implemented a proper varnish setup along with memcached integration Update PHP to current stable release and reconfigured it to use the FastCGI Process Manager Wrote backup scripts for the drupal environment using BASH scripting along with usage of the Drupal DRUSH tool for backup verification and testing Release Engineer Lead GENTOO FOUNDATION Albuquerque NM 2009 to 2015 Lead engineer for their 10th year anniversary Linux  which included a wide array of open source software Downloaded by millions of users worldwide the Gentoo Linux  became popular for being able to showcase over 1200 FOSS programs on multiple desktop environments and windows manager which prompted the well respected Linux Format magazine to give it a top rating of 1010 on July 2012 praising it as the best Linux live system ever made Drupal Consultant NEIGHBORHOOD CHARTER SCHOOL OF HARLEM New York NY 2012 to 2014 New York Providing custom Drupal front end and back end services to help the school serve students and families in a more engaging manner I took over the site after the old developer left so I have been revamping the site as time goes by removing obsolete and outdated practices done by the previous developer helping the school transition to a complete redesign in the future Drupal Consultant NYCE CAMP New York NY 2012 to 2013 New York The NYCE Camp is the largest Drupal Community conferences in New York City which features 4 days of incredible drupal talent presenting various sessions on drupal I have personally been involved in the Drupal NYC monthly meetings since 2008 and have been a featured presenter on many occasions Web developer Consultant meetupcom New York NY 2012 to 2013 New York Consulted on the use of Drupal for their main website which was a static HTML implementation Developed a Drupal 7 site with integration to meetupcom which includes latest meet up dates available on the httpnylugorg website Web Developer Linux Integrator KETCHUM New York NY 2012 to 2012 New York Provide performance tuning and site analysis for various FEDEX web properties that didnt handle traffic and became unstable at high loads Improved apache web server connection rate 220 and performance penetration testing on the CentOS server Web Developer IMMERSI Holland MI 2010 to 2011 Provided custom web development using PHP and Drupal CMS for some of their client websites Linux System Administrator STARING MARKETING Chesterton IN 2006 to 2009 Provided managed hosting for the company website and managed the cpanel implementation which included a DNS cluster setup and customized exim mail filters to combat spam Implemented custom linux environments utilizing various tools for monitoring including nagios and grsecurity Infrastructure Lead20022014 MISSION ACCOMPLISH New York New York Implemented the design layout and configuration of a complete Linux powered server infrastructure Help company use open source software in the early stages which helped provide a vast amount of security related services to clients Increased infrastructure security by moving from Windows based operating systems to Linux Migrated infrastructure to using Gentoo linux for all development and protection of client data using grsecurity and zabbix IDS Front end Web Developer ATECH SYSTEMS New York NY 2000 to 2002 New York Developed the first company website using PHP and helped with Internet marketing which helped the company rank high on search engines Helped company transition to using the web to help promote their business more by participating in setup and deployment Performance tuning of LAMP stack application including MySQLPHPApacheNGINX and MemCached Custom Linux kernel implementation and configuration skills Experience in device mapper Advanced in ZFS implementation using RAIDZ or Mirrored arrays with automated system snapshots using custom scripting Experienced setting up zabbix IDS to handle the monitoring of thousands of servers I have implemented this for various clients with great success and feedback This is the latest IDS around way more advanced than Nagios Experience in Linux container technology including LXCDocker and Rocket Have setup custom lxc and docker architectures in Gentoo Linux Knowledge of mdadmdmraid using various difference file systems including extfs34 xfs jfs Long time Linux developer for the Gentoo Linux project currently lead for the livedvd release which is due to be released in a few weeks All around expert at cyber security methods within the Linux kernel userspace Grsecurity SELinux
